thread.title: Francisca

author: Francisca
title: Francisca
text:
First time I ordered my tyres on this website and really please with the product and service provided.
I ordered on line two weeks in advance and they emailed me earlier on the day to advise me around what time they will be around, therefore the driver called me two hours before the time arranged as he was ahead with his scheduled and very please to see him outside my home. Very kind and efficiently job done as I will recommend to anyone, many thanks.
